entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
